# -------------------------
# Ignore environment files
# -------------------------
.env
*.env

# -------------------------
# Python cache files
# -------------------------
__pycache__/
*.pyc
*.pyo
*.pyd

# -------------------------
# Virtual environment folders
# -------------------------
venv/
env/
.venv/

# -------------------------
# IDE / editor folders
# -------------------------
.vscode/
.idea/

# -------------------------
# OS-generated files
# -------------------------
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# -------------------------
# Byte-compiled / distribution
# -------------------------
build/
dist/
*.egg-info/
